item.title: Random chest
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“guitars595, post:5, topic:228009”]What is the code i put in Item2 like this? public static int randomBarrows[] = { 995, 758, 788, 983}; Would this be right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 08:20:00 pm[/size][hr]Okay I got it but when i don’t know where to put this case 10284: //Random Barrows if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6); deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(); sendMessage("You unlock the six keyholes and recieve a random barrows item!"); } Under case 185 or something else[/quote]

Yes, that would be right, and you put it under your first click objects.

Read full topic

item.title: Random chest
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

First of all

ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randonBarrows();

Should be

ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBarrows();

And then

hasumon:

Item2.java add the randombarrow items and your done.

item.title: Random chest
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Well I’m making a barrows chest and I want it so if you have 6 keys and you click on the chest it gives you a random barrows item. Here is what I have so far [code] case 10284: // Barrows random chest
if(playerHasItemAmount(605, 6);
deleteItem(605, getItemSlot(605) 6);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randonBarrows();
sendMessage(“You unlock the six key holes on the Barrows Chest!”);

            }[/code] What do i need for it to give me a random barrows item

Read full topic
